Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Wheel brake assembly seizure. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
